divs: Sighting Detailslooked up in the sky and a sliver football shaped craft hovering heard a plane sound but not coming from the object looked to my left and saw a plane looked back and the craft was making tight circles told my friend to come look at at this and looked back up and it was gone now i know what it feels like to see something and people say your crazy i dont care if anyone beleives me or not I KNOW WHAT I SAW!!
